paper_abstract: Accurate pupil features extraction is a key step for this recognition In this paper, we propose a new algorithm to extract pupil features precisely within gray level ins images The angular integral projection function (AIPF) is developed as a general function to perform integral projection along angular directions, both the well known vertical and horizontal integral projection functions can be viewed as special cases of AIPF Another implementation for AIPF based on localized Radon transform is also presented First, the approximate position of pupil center is detected Then, a set of pupil's radial boundary points arc detected using AIPF Finally, a circle to the detected boundary points is fitted Experimental results on 2 655 ins images from CASIA V3 0 show high accuracy with rapid execution time
paper_title: ACCURATE PUPIL FEATURES EXTRACTION BASED ON NEW PROJECTION FUNCTION
